flawed_nl_solution:
Mary will inflate a total of 10 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<10*30=300>>300 balloons
Jess will inflate a total of 7 balloons/minute x 30 minutes = <<7*30=120>>120 balloons
Christina will inflate a total of 4 balloons/minute x 15 minutes = <<4*15=60>>60 balloons
Combining all balloons, they made 300 balloons + 120 balloons + 60 balloons = <<300+120+60=480>>480 balloons
#### 480

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 210, not 120. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
